titles.title: Honoring the life and achievements of George C. Springer, Sr., the Northeast regional director and a former vice president of the American Federation of Teachers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
1/30/2007--Introduced.
Honors the late George C. Springer, Sr., former Northeast regional director and vice president of the American Federation of Teachers, for his courageous and compassionate leadership.
